channel.title: [PI]Spawning NPC's - Strange error:S[PI]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape, I have spawned 100s of NPC's before and I have never had this problem.
I'm currently trying to spawn 'x' amount of NPC's for my new mini-game, PerfectionX!; zombies(based off BlackOps;zombies).
Here is what I am spawning;
[code=java]spawn = 77 3496 3573 0 1 0 0 0 10 spawn = 77 3496 3574 0 1 0 0 0 10 spawn = 77 3495 3573 0 1 0 0 0 10 spawn = 77 3495 3573 0 1 0 0 0 10 spawn = 1466 3505 3576 0 1 0 0 0 10 spawn = 1466 3503 Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . Terminate batch job (Y/N)?[/code]
I don't understand what's wrong, I've never had this error before:/.

item.title: [PI]Spawning NPC's - Strange error:S[PI]
item.dc:creator: @AnonymousZ AnonymousZ
item.description:
@AnonymousZ wrote:

Me and my friend have both gone through every single line, double check they were all tabs and not spaces.

So it’s not that:/.

Edited the whole section of spawns, triple checked there is no tabs as well.

Now I have this run error -

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:3229) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:63) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Spawning NPC's - Strange error:S[PI]
item.dc:creator: @JavaCoderV2 JavaCoderV2
item.description:
@JavaCoderV2 wrote:

The error said it was the "76 "
but you see there is a space in the number… It has to be a tab, not a space. make sure you fix that.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Spawning NPC's - Strange error:S[PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Used a space instead of a tab.

Read full topic
